metadata.title: USN-7259-3 -- GNU C Library vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-7259-1 fixed a vulnerability in GNU C Library. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that GNU C Library incorrectly handled memory when using  the assert function. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a  denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7259-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  eglibc-source - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 glibc-doc - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc-bin - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc-dev-bin - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-amd64 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-armel - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-dev - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-dev-amd64 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-dev-armel - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-dev-i386 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-dev-x32 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-i386 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-pic - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-prof - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 libc6-x32 - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 multiarch-support - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 nscd - 2.19-0ubuntu6.15+esm4 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
